mapper.update: UPDATE sys_company SET companyNo = #{companyNo}, companyName = #{companyName}, credit = #{credit}, address = #{address}, contact = #{contact}, contactNumber = #{contactNumber}, summary = #{summary}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, webSite = #{webSite}, productType = #{productType} WHERE companyId = #{companyId}
mapper.select: SELECT companyId, companyNo, companyName, companyType, sc.areaId, sa.areaName, credit, contact, contactNumber, address, summary, longitude, latitude, auditing, webSite, sc.createDate, productType FROM sys_company sc LEFT JOIN sys_area sa ON sc.areaId = sa.areaId WHERE sa.areaId = #{areaId} AND #{productType} & sc.productType > 0
